text: The Veneto Classic is a one-day road cycling race. The race has happened every year since 2021 in Veneto, Italy. The race is now on the UCI ProSeries calendar. The race was also on the UCI Europe Tour calendar as a 1.1 rated event. ==Winners== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2021 establishments in Italy Category:Cycle races
title: Veneto Classic
